title: Saros: Release date, trailers, and everything we know about PlayStation's next sci-fi adventure
description: Roguelite structure, mysterious narrative, and breakneck third-person shooter action come together once again in Housemarque's Saros.
content: Roguelite structure, mysterious narrative, and breakneck third-person shooter action come together once again in Housemarque's Saros.
